segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and I’m amazed at how determined he is to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s just balancing there like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s really brave, or maybe just really reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s reaching up, it’s like he’s on a mission and nothing can stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s done this before and knows exactly how to get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for him, and it’s so cute how she trusts him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire his determination, even if it’s a little scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly, and I’m just waiting for him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to make it, but I’m still holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s holding the plate is so careful, like he’s practiced this.
segments.speaker: PAR
